description:
A TV reporter who filmed the expedition team on an island where they were looking for Kabuto fossils.
She was interested in the TV ratings and commentated on all the usual events happening to the team which she later found out was being caused by Umberto who then told her that if the expedition team disturbed the Kabuto fossil then the moon would turn red and the island will sink. After hearing what Umberto had to say regarding the Kabuto fossils she ignored him and continued filing the expedition team
Unfortunately for her once the Kabuto revived from their fossils they managed to destroy the camera, however, after she escaped from the island she decided that it would be best if the Kabuto were kept secret.
name: Josei Reporter
